contentList.content: Distant cousins of the Elves, the Shadar Kai are devotees of the Raven Queen.
Sworn to the Raven Queen's service, the mysterious Shadar-Kai originate from Shadowfel. Once fey, they have lost their vibrance and emotion.
Once simply a pile of bones in an old tomb, you have not only been raised, you have also gone through an Awakening spell, bringing sentience back to what's left of your body.
Sturdy Skeletons have an additional bonus to Constitution as well as Charisma.
